description:
Create a new available zone named "newzone", and use the available zone to create a vm.
Then, when you use the API interface to query the vm details, you will find the available zone of the vm is changed between the new available zone "newzone" and the default value "nova".It will be back to normal after a period of time.
The openstak dashboard also has this problem when you refresh the vm details page.
title: the available zone will get back to the default 'nova'

comments.content:
Create a new available zone named "newzone", and use the available zone to create a vm.
Then, when you use the API interface to query the vm details, you will find the available zone of the vm is changed between the new available zone "newzone" and the default value "nova".It will be back to normal after a period of time.
The openstak dashboard also has this problem when you refresh the vm details page.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~quzhaoyang

comments.content: Which release of nova is this on? Do you have a specific git hash for nova?  And do you have specific recreate steps for this?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: [Expired for OpenStack Compute (nova) because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~janitor
